ruleBookInfo.author: novels.userName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
(()=>{
var json = result.match('{\"time.+}')[0];
json = JSON.parse(json);

var novels = (()=>{
    var result = "";
    for(var key in json.novel){
        result += JSON.stringify(json.novel[key]);
    }
    return JSON.parse(result);
})();

var users = (()=>{
    var result = "";
    for(var key in json.user){
        result += JSON.stringify(json.user[key]);
    }
    return JSON.parse(result);
})();

var hasChapters = novels.seriesNavData != null

var tocUrl = (()=>{
    if (hasChapters){
        return "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/series_content/"+novels.seriesNavData.seriesId+"?limit=10&last_order=0&order_by=asc&lang=zh"
    }else {
        return "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/show.php?id="+novels.id
    }
})();

return JSON.stringify({novels:novels,users:users,tocUrl:tocUrl});
})();
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: novels.title

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
(()=>{

var json = result.match('{\"time.+}')[0];
json = JSON.parse(json);

var novels = (()=>{
    var result = "";
    for(var key in json.novel){
        result += JSON.stringify(json.novel[key]);
    }
    return JSON.parse(result);
})();

var nextUrl = (()=>{

    var hasNext = novels.seriesNavData != null && novels.seriesNavData.next != null

    if (hasNext){
        return "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/show.php?id="+novels.seriesNavData.next.id;
    }else {
        return ""
    }

})();

return nextUrl;

})();
</js>
